entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 12:00 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -17.1°C
Wind: NE 17 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
